scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-dev && npm run deploy-prod
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run synth && npm run deploy-dev-backend && npm run deploy-dev-frontend
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run synth && npm run deploy-prod-backend && npm run deploy-prod-frontend
scripts.deploy-dev-backend: npm run deploy-dev-codecontainer && cdk deploy -e OneTimeSharingDevStorageStack OneTimeSharingDevApiStack --require-approval='never'
scripts.deploy-prod-backend: npm run deploy-prod-codecontainer && cdk deploy -e OneTimeSharingProdStorageStack OneTimeSharingProdApiStack --require-approval='never'
scripts.synth: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend && cdk bootstrap && cdk synth --app 'npx ts-node bin/onetimesharing-temporarysecret-cdk.ts'
scripts.build-backend: cd ../handlers && npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist.zip *
